In "Jessica's Escape", you take on the role of the powerful witch, Jessica, who has been imprisoned in a dungeon for 1000 years. Armed with her deadly fireballs and your skills in combat, you must fight off enemies and navigate through the maze-like dungeon to find the correct path to the exit. But beware, the dungeon is full of dangers and traps that can easily kill you. Your reflexes, combat skills, and knowledge of the dungeon will be put to the test. Can you help Jessica escape her prison and take revenge on those who wronged her?
